**Subject:** Sincere Apology for Missed Project Deadline  

Dear [Client's Name],  

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to write to express my deepest regret for missing the projected deadline for our [Project Name] due to unexpected technical issues that arose during the final stages. This was entirely on our end, and I take full responsibility for the delay.  

We have always valued your trust and partnership, and this delay has been deeply disappointing. The technical challenges were difficult to anticipate and had caused us to delay our progress, and for that, I am truly sorry.  

To make things right, we have immediately reassigned the project to a dedicated team and have prioritized it completely. We are currently working to meet the revised schedule and can confirm that the final deliverables will be submitted by [new deadline], which we have made a personal priority to achieve.  

This is a difficult time for us, and we deeply regret any inconvenience this has caused. Please know that we take full responsibility and will do what we must to ensure that your expectations are met as faithfully as possible.  

Thank you for your patience and understanding. I will be following up regularly on progress.  

Sincerely,  
[Your Full Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Contact Information]  

---

question: My Windows laptop has been running really slowly lately. What are the most effective steps I can take to speed it up without reinstalling Windows?
